title: Meet Trinny the litter picking eco dog
content: This video can not be playedA collie dog called Trinny is helping clear litter while out on walks in her local parks in Clydebank.Her owner Alanna Jackson said the five-year-old started to pick up rubbish on walks, so she decided to use Trinny's natural instinct to help the community.Using treats, she has trained Trinny to start dropping the litter in the bin.
